key.name: persist
key.summary: Apply saved Boost state after login
key.description: This will prompt user for permission

key.name: clean
key.description: Remove the submenu and subtitle from the toggle

key.name: boost
key.description: Not visible in the Preferences window

key.name: epb-off
key.summary: Set EPB when frequency boost is off
key.description: -1 is no change, others are valid EPB values

key.name: epb-on
key.summary: Set EPB when frequency boost is on
key.description: -1 is no change, others are valid EPB values

key.name: epp-off
key.summary: Set EPP when frequency boost is off
key.description: -1 is no change, others are valid EPP values

key.name: epp-on
key.summary: Set EPP when frequency boost is on
key.description: -1 is no change, others are valid EPP values

key.name: polkit-rules
key.summary: Save if user added Polkit rules
key.description: Querying for the rules requires permissions, so we save instead
